name: EventStorming | ZycieNaKodach.pl
description:
What's inside?

  • Components for all EventStorming builing-blocks and most common flows.
  • Examples for Events, Command, Polocies, Aggregates and more. Incredibly fast copying of ready-to-use samples.
  • Real EventStorming sessions moved to this Figma template. The most serious problem while learning this method is lack of real examples. There will you gain them for free.
  • Template for lead EventModeling session (coming soon...)


Template created by Mateusz Nowak from zycienakodach.pl (my blog in native language - Polish).

Feel free to use it, but please remember to credit the author.


GitHub: https://github.com/nowakprojects

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/MateuszNaKodach/

Dev.to: https://dev.to/mateusznowak


Would you like to contribute?

Left a comment on the file or write to me on LinkedIn or email: mateusz@zycienakodach.pl


Disclaimer:

This template is used by me for EventStorming.

I want to improve it in the near future, but it may be usable for you in the current form.

I don’t want to keep it only for me longer, because “we have only today”.
